title: I cant access my club
body: A couple of months ago I made a club consisting of some of my friends but, ever since I got the new client I don't appear as the leader of the club, in fact the game does't show me the icon of the club. I then asked some of my friend to try and nominate me in but they said I still appear as leader.

replies.body: I'm having the same issue for the past couple weeks. Have tried having my friends nominate me back in but that doesnt work. They all can access it and get  their tag beside their name but for me it doesnt show up anywhere. Tag: USoC Name: United states of Canada

I have this issue too.
Club name: MissedBullet
Club tag: MiBul

This issue may have been due to a recent [ club outage ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016)and not related to using the updated client.  What's the name and tag of the club?  I'm happy to take a look!
